fields_of_interest: Justice and Fundamental Rights, External Relations, Migration and asylum
eu_initiatives: Everything that touches freedom of religion or belief, outside EU and in EU, as well as anti-discrimination policies.
organisation_name: European Interreligious Forum for Religious Freedom (EIFRF)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication: EIFRF worked on several resolutions at the Council of Europe with success. It organized many roundtables for International Religious Freedom, gathering people from all faiths or none. Many conferences in Belgium, Switzerland, France, UK, Spain, Italy. Several joint initiatives to get policy changed or implemented on religious freedom in countries all around the globe.
